description.value:
This ragged, mud-stained cape closes with a single black button engraved with a leering devil's face. When you @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Leap]{Leap}, @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.High Jump]{High Jump}, or @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Long Jump]{Long Jump} (or Vault, if you're Spring-Heeled Jack), you gain a +1 item bonus to Stealth checks to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Hide]{Hide} or @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Sneak]{Sneak} until the start of your next turn.

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-effects.Effect: Jack's Tattered Cape]{Effect: Jack's Tattered Cape}

source.value: Pathfinder Lost Omens: Monsters of Myth
